name: Freaks N' Beasts
description:
The tribe of Dust Bunnies plans to transform into real bunnies, the only thing they need is a bit of water, the only place where they can get the water is the Freaks' aquarium, the Freaks need to defend their only source of water from the enemies.

CONTROLS:

A/D/Arrow keys - Move camera

Click on the cards to summon your characters
